peekOfCode:
def delete_item(db:Session, item_id:int):
    db_item = db.query(models.Item).filter(models.Item.id == item_id).first()
    if db_item is None:
        return None
    db.delete(db_item)
    db.commit()
    return db_item

Base = declarative_base()

    try:
        yield db
    finally:
        db.close()

peekOfCode:
def get_computer_system_info_remote(computer_name: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """Obtiene informaci√≥n del sistema computacional remoto"""
    command = """
    Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_ComputerSystem | Select-Object Manufacturer, Model, TotalPhysicalMemory, NumberOfProcessors, SystemType | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 2
    """
    result = run_powershell_command_remote(command, computer_name)
    data = safe_json_parse(result, "computer_system")
    if 'error' not in data and 'TotalPhysicalMemory' in data and data['TotalPhysicalMemory']:
        data['TotalPhysicalMemoryGB'] = round(data['TotalPhysicalMemory'] / (1024**3), 2)
    return data

def get_network_info_remote(computer_name: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
    """Obtiene informaci√≥n de red remota"""
    command = """
    Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_NetworkAdapterConfiguration | Where-Object { $_.IPEnabled -eq $true } |
    Select-Object Description, IPAddress, IPSubnet, DefaultIPGateway, MACAddress, DNSServerSearchOrder | ConvertTo-Json
    """
    result = run_powershell_command_remote(command, computer_name)
    data = safe_json_parse(result, "network")
    if 'error' not in data:
        adapters = [data] if isinstance(data, dict) else data

def get_graphics_info_remote(computer_name: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
    """Obtiene informaci√≥n de tarjetas gr√°ficas remotas"""
    command = """
    Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_VideoController | Where-Object { $_.Name -notlike '*Remote*' } |
    Select-Object Name, AdapterRAM, DriverVersion, VideoProcessor | ConvertTo-Json
    """
    result = run_powershell_command_remote(command, computer_name)
    data = safe_json_parse(result, "graphics")
    if 'error' not in data:
        graphics = [data] if isinstance(data, dict) else data

def run_powershell_command_remote(command: str, computer_name: str, username: str = DEFAULT_USERNAME, password: str = DEFAULT_PASSWORD, timeout: int = 30) -> str:
    """Versi√≥n corregida que fuerza autenticaci√≥n NTLM"""

class User(Base):
    __tablename__ = "users"
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, index=True)
    email = Column(String, unique=True, index=True)
    hashed_password = Column(String)
    is_active = Column(Boolean, default=False)
    created_at = Column(DateTime(timezone=True), server_default=func.now())
    #relacion con tabla items \
    items = relationship("Item", back_populates="owner")
class Item(Base):

label: Item
peekOfCode:
class Item(Base):
    __tablename__ = "items"
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, index=True)
    title = Column(String, index=True)
    description = Column(Text)
    # ese users es el nombre de la tabla asquerosa esa 
    owner_id = Column(Integer, ForeignKey("users.id"))
    owner = relationship("User", back_populates='items')
